vulnerability_information:
LOOK rezult
https://hackerone.com/reports/127809

{F82764}

POC

Copy in {F82766} TXT file (all) and create a new review 
I warn you , if you do this , then the report cannot open .

You can create a report , attach files and replace my files F82764 and F82765 , paste in the contents of the report and create it

Why is it a security bug ?
I answer , if I get an invite to report to someone , I may make it available to all


P.S EXAMPLE html inside <code> in markdown

` {F82766} `


Thanks PISARENKO

activities.message:
Hey @pisarenko,

Thank you for taking the time to submit this report! I have confirmed the bug and we're looking into ways of fixing this. Please stay put while we work on a solution :-)

Cheers,
Remon
activities.markdown_message:
Hey @pisarenko,

Thank you for taking the time to submit this report! I have confirmed the bug and we're looking into ways of fixing this. Please stay put while we work on a solution :-)

Cheers,
Remon

activities.message:
Hey @pisarenko,

To inform you: we're working on a fix that limits the maximum amount of attachments linked in a comment/report. We expect this fix to be released to production at 3:30PM CEST. I'll get back to you when the fix is released to confirm that we fixed the issue. Thank you for you patience,
Remon
activities.markdown_message:

Remon

activities.message:
examples of similar reports
#59369 (Making any Report Failed to load) (500$)
#118663 (Denial of Service any Report) (SWAG)

P.S may be 
#115205 (Putting link inside link in markdown) (500$)
While not a security issue, per se, the fact that you can prevent somebody from accessing a team profile and by causing a denial of service for other users, this is definitely unwanted.
My POC the error 524 on the website (all page)
https://hackerone.com/reports/127827#activity-885944 


I look forward to the answer , I hope you haven't forgotten me

activities.message:
Hello Alex!

Thanks for being patient with us, we apologize for the delay. We've reached our conclusion - this report won't be rewarded with monetary bounty, since the report did not break our bulk report interface. The team could still perform basic actions, such as closure, on the report, and avoid this report being shared widely. 
#59369 broke the aforementioned bulk report action interface, while #115205 could potentially break public facing pages. 

Regardless, we still wanted to thank you for your patience with us and for the report, so we have decided to send you some swag!  Enjoy : )

Regards,
HackerOne
activities.markdown_message:
Hello Alex!

Thanks for being patient with us, we apologize for the delay. We've reached our conclusion - this report won't be rewarded with monetary bounty, since the report did not break our bulk report interface. The team could still perform basic actions, such as closure, on the report, and avoid this report being shared widely.

59369 broke the aforementioned bulk report action interface, while #115205 could potentially break public facing pages.

Regardless, we still wanted to thank you for your patience with us and for the report, so we have decided to send you some swag! Enjoy : )

Regards,
HackerOne

summaries.content:
"Why is it a security bug ?"
I answer , if I get an invite to report to someone , I may make it  NOT available report  to all

And I found the error 524 on the website (all page)  works on all users

{F82765}

"The rule is, jam tomorrow and jam yesterday - but never jam today." - Lewis Carroll
